1.0.name: wordpress/magic-post-thumbnail
1.0.description:
Automatically add a thumbnail for your posts. Retrieve first image from Google Images based on post title and add it as your featured thumbnail when you publish/update it. Settings allow you to configure some settings:

  • Some options : Safe Search, Country Search, Filter only images royalty-free.
  • Which Post type (Posts and Pages included) it is enabled
  • V1.3 can now mass generate thumbnails !
